name: Toys And Games 6 Multiple Choice Quiz | Hobbies | 10 Questions

questions.text: In what country did chess originate?
questions.explanation:
India.

	Around 6th century A.D. Known as the Royal Game

questions.text: Who was the long time host of 'Match Game'?
Which of the following chess pieces moves only diagonally?
questions.explanation:
Bishop.

	Each player has two bishops, one that moves on the light colored squares and one that moves on the dark colored squares.

questions.text: In bridge how many tricks is a book?
What is the highest cribbage score possible in one hand?
What do players conquer in the end of the game of 'Risk'?
questions.explanation:
World.

	The ultimate game in global warfare made by Parker Brothers.

questions.text: How many different colored wedges are there in Trival Pursuit?
Name the game that had a picture of Vincent Price on the box.
In what country did the modern version of badminton originate?
questions.explanation:
England.

	First played about 1873. May have started in the 1860s in India by British officers but not confirmed.

questions.text: What is the highest ranking suit in bridge?
questions.explanation:
Spades.

	All bridge games stem from the game of whist.Order of suit rankings-spades,hearts,diamonds,clubs.
